Alias.Name: QUESTIONNAIRE SUR LA SANT DU PATIENT 9 (PHQ-9)

FormDef.v4:SummaryFormat: Meal Intake - Meal Type: {MLTRT}, Meal Time: {MLTIM}
FormDef.Name: Meal Intake

Description.TranslatedText:
NCS: Not Clinically Significant
CS: Clinically Significant

RangeCheck.FormalExpression: ORRES_BMI <= 30 && ORRES_BMI >= 19

ErrorMessage.TranslatedText: BMI is outside of normal range. Please verify.

Question.TranslatedText: Click the randomize button to randomize the subject and assign a treatment and  randomization number to the subject.
Was a photo taken of the wound?

Specify the Inclusion Criteria not met
(Please check all that apply)

a)     Subjects will have given their written informed consent to participate in the study.

b)    Male and female healthy subjects, aged 19-65 years inclusive

c)     The females must be of non-childbearing potential defined as pre-menopausal females with a documented tubal ligation or hysterectomy; or post-menopausal defined as 12 month of amenorrhea (in questionable cases a blood sample with simultaneous determination of follicle stimulating hormone 25-140 IE/L and estradiol <200 pmol/L is confirmatory).

d)    The male subjects must agree to use condom in combination with use of contraceptive methods with a failure rate of < 1% to prevent pregnancy and drug exposure of a partner and refrain from donating sperm from the date of dosing until 3 months after dosing of the investigational product

e)     Body mass index (BMI) ≥ 19 and  ≤30 kg/m2

f)     Subjects must be in good health, as determined by a medical history, physical examination, 12-lead ECG and clinical laboratory evaluations as judged by the Investigator

g)     The subject will be able to comply with the requirements of the protocol in the opinion of the Investigator

Specify the Exclusion Criteria met
(Please check all that apply)

a)     Subjects who previously have demonstrated hypersensitivity to the investigational medicinal product

b)    Subjects atopic or with history of allergy as judged by the Investigator

c)     Subjects who have used any prescribed systemic or topical medication within 14 days before the first dose administration

d)    Subjects who have used any OTC systemic or topical medication within 7 days before the first dose administration (with the exception of vitamin/mineral supplements, paracetamol not exceeding 1500mg/week)

e)     Subjects who have used any medications known to chronically alter drug absorption or elimination processes within 30 days before the first dose administration

f)     Subjects who have participated in a clinical study involving administration of an investigational drug or a marketed drug within the past 3 months

g)     Subjects who have donated plasma within one month of screening or any blood donation/blood loss > 450 mL during the 3 months prior to screening

h)    Subjects with, or with a history of, any clinically significant neurological, gastrointestinal, renal, hepatic, cardiovascular, psychological, pulmonary, metabolic, endocrine, hematological or other major disorder as judged by the Investigator

i)      Subjects who have had a clinically significant illness within 4 weeks of the start of the study as judged by the Investigator

j)      Subjects who are known to have serum hepatitis or who are carriers of the hepatitis B surface antigen (HBsAg), or hepatitis C antibody, or have a positive result to the test for HIV antigens and/or antibodies

k)    Subjects who have used nicotine containing products less than 48 hours before the first dose administration
Did the subject meet all eligibility criteria?
Does the subject have any clinically relevant medical or surgical history and / or any existing concomitant diseases?
Please record details in the Medical History log.
Did the subject experience any new adverse event or was there any worsening of concomitant diseases?
Has the subject had any new adverse events or any changes in the reported adverse events since last visit?
Please record details in the Adverse Events log.
Does the subject take any relevant concomitant medications / therapies?
Has the subject had any new concomitant medications or any changes in the reported concomitant medications since last visit?
Please record details in the Prior and Concomitant Medications log.

Assessments performed in this visit
(Please check all that apply)
Clinically significant findings should be recorded in the Medical History log.
Clinically significant findings should be recorded in the Adverse Events log.

RangeCheck.FormalExpression: AESTDAT__format == 0 || AESTDAT__format == 2

ErrorMessage.TranslatedText: Month part of start date of adverse event is not complete. Please correct.
Start date of adverse event is not on or before the Study End date in End of Study form. Please verify.
Start date of adverse event is not on or after the Date of randomization. Please verify.

RangeCheck.FormalExpression: AEENDAT__format == 0 || AEENDAT__format == 2

ErrorMessage.TranslatedText: Month part of end date of adverse event is not complete. Please correct.
End date of adverse event is not on or after the Start date. Please correct.
Start date of adverse event is before the randomization date, however Relationship to the study treatment is not selected as "Not related". Please verify.
Start date of adverse event is before the randomization date, however Action taken with study treatment is not selected as "Not applicable". Please verify.

Description.TranslatedText:
Mild The event required minimal or no medication and does not interfere with
the subjects daily activities.
Moderate The event resulted in a slight inconvenience and may cause a moderate interference
with the subjects daily functioning.
Severe The event interrupts a subjects usual daily activity and may require drug therapy
or other medication. Severe events are usually incapacitating.

ErrorMessage.TranslatedText: Outcome is selected as "Fatal", but seriousness criteria is not selected as "Death". Please verify.
Ongoing is selected as "Yes", however inappropriate outcome of adverse event is selected. Please verify.
Ongoing is selected as "No", however inappropriate outcome of adverse event is selected. Please verify.
Seriousness criteria is specified as "Death", but outcome of adverse event is not recorded as "Fatal". Please verify.
Outcome is selected as "Fatal", but 'Primary reason for discontinuation' is not selected as "Adverse event" in End of Study form. Please verify.

Question.TranslatedText:
Seriousness criteria
(Please check all that apply)

ErrorMessage.TranslatedText: Date of death is not same as the End date of Adverse Event. Please correct.

RangeCheck.FormalExpression: AEDTHDAT__format == 0

ErrorMessage.TranslatedText: Date is not complete. Please correct.
Date of death is not same as the Study End date in End of Study form. Please verify.

Question.TranslatedText: Was any other medication or treatment given because of the occurrence of this adverse event?
Please record relevant details in the Prior and Concomitant Medications log.

ErrorMessage.TranslatedText: End date of medical event is not on or after the Start date. Please correct.

Question.TranslatedText: Is the subject continuing to the next visit?
Please plan the next visit.
Please complete the End of Study form.
Is the quality of photo acceptable?

RangeCheck.FormalExpression: SCORE2 >= 0 && SCORE2 <= 10

ErrorMessage.TranslatedText: Assessment score is not within the expected range. Please verify.

Question.TranslatedText: Is the quality of photo acceptable?

RangeCheck.FormalExpression: SCORE1 >= 0 && SCORE1 <= 10

ErrorMessage.TranslatedText: Assessment score is not within the expected range. Please verify.

Question.TranslatedText: Click the 'Allocate' button to allocate a kit to the subject.

ErrorMessage.TranslatedText: Age is not within the expected range (19-65), defined per protocol as an inclusion criteria. Please verify.

Question.TranslatedText: Is the subject of child bearing potential?
Clinically significant findings should be recorded in the Medical History log.
Clinically significant findings should be recorded in the Adverse Event log.
Please indicate below where you experienced pain
Click on the scale below to indicate how severe your pain is.
Select the date when you first experienced the reaction
Is the reaction ongoing at the time of submitting this report?
Select the date when you last experienced the reaction
Please copy the drawing of the intersecting infinity loops in the box below.
Please draw a clock showing the time 2PM in the box below.
Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems?
1. Little interest or pleasure in doing things
3. Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much
4. Feeling tired or having little energy
6. Feeling bad about yourself — or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down
7. Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television
8. Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed? Or the opposite — being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual
9. Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way
If you checked off any problems, how difficult have these problems made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people?

RangeCheck.FormalExpression: SYSBP_VSORRES <= 139

ErrorMessage.TranslatedText: Systolic blood pressure is not within the expected range. Please verify.
The blood pressure is deviating from the screening result with more than 25%, please verify.
Diastolic blood pressure is not less than the Systolic blood pressure. Please verify.

RangeCheck.FormalExpression: DIABP_VSORRES <= 89

ErrorMessage.TranslatedText: Diastolic blood pressure is not within the expected range. Please verify.

RangeCheck.FormalExpression: HR_VSORRES <= 100

ErrorMessage.TranslatedText: Heart rate is not within the expected range. Please verify.
Time is recorded in future. Please correct.

Question.TranslatedText: This is an example of an edit check cross forms. The edit check is firing immediately if the gender selected is not matching the gender in the demographics form. This check will be closed automatically if the value in the demographics form is corrected. If the value in the demographics form is again updated to conflict this entry, the edit check will trigger automatically again.
Confirm the gender of this subject
